title: Process Final Event Settlement
description: An event manager needs to process the final invoice and settlement for a completed trade show.

tasks.description: Gather all final charges for the event, including room rental, final catering bill, and any additional labor charges.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles all billable items for the event.

tasks.description: Generate the final invoice, applying the client's initial deposit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a final invoice showing the total cost minus the deposit paid.

tasks.description: Send the final invoice to the client for payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the invoice to the client's accounting department.

tasks.description: Once paid, close out the event in the booking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent marks the event as 'Settled' and archives the record.
